executable.title: BRAINS Resample Sphere Using Icosahedron
executable.description: This program resamples the input sphere with an icosahedron and outputs the icosahedron sphere associated with resampled scalar values from the input sphere.
executable.contributor: Wen Li and Luis Ibanez and Vincent Magnotta
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this work was provided by NIH/NINDS award NS050568

string-enumeration.name: interpolateType
string-enumeration.description: The type of interpolation to be used
string-enumeration.label: Interpolate Type

integer.name: resolution
integer.description: The resolution of the icosahedron sphere
integer.label: resolution

double.name: radius
double.description: The radius of input and output spheres
double.label: Sphere Radius
